snippet: Some skeptics of the missile-defense program saw the failure as further evidence that the technology was unreliable and might not be worth the expense.
abstract: Pentagon says test launching of advanced missile-defense interceptor failed to hit its target over Pacific Ocean, four months after Obama administration announced that it would spend $1 billion to increase missile defense in response to verbal threats from North Korea; skeptics see failure as additional evidence that the technology is unreliable and not worth the expense.
lead_paragraph: Some skeptics of the missile-defense program saw the failure as further evidence that the technology was unreliable and might not be worth the expense.

headline.main: Missile Defense Interceptor Misses Target in Test
headline.print_headline: Missile Defense Interceptor Misses Target in Test

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
